flavorText: Purphoros shaped the oreads out of stray coals from his forge.

foreignData.flavorText: Purphoros formte die Oreaden aus verstreuten Kohlen seiner Schmiede.
foreignData.name: Schmiedegeborene Oreaden
foreignData.text: Konstellation — Immer wenn die Schmiedegeborenen Oreaden oder eine andere Verzauberung unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, fügen die Schmiedegeborenen Oreaden einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Purforos moldeó a las oréades a partir de carbones que se habían caído de su forja.
foreignData.name: Oréades nacidas de la forja
foreignData.text: Constelación — Siempre que las Oréades nacidas de la forja u otro encantamiento entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, las Oréades nacidas de la forja hacen 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Purphoros façonna les oréades à partir de charbons échappés de sa forge.
foreignData.name: Oréades nées des forges
foreignData.text: Constellation — À chaque fois que les Oréades nées des forges ou un autre enchantement arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, les Oréades nées des forges infligent 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: Purforos diede forma alle oreadi da tizzoni sfuggiti alla sua forgia.
foreignData.name: Oreadi Plasmate nella Forgia
foreignData.text: Costellazione — Ogniqualvolta le Oreadi Plasmate nella Forgia o un altro incantesimo entrano nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, le Oreadi Plasmate nella Forgia infliggono 1 danno a una creatura o un giocatore bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: パーフォロスはその炉の余った石炭からオリアードたちを作った。
foreignData.name: 炉生まれのオリアード
foreignData.text: 星座 ― 炉生まれのオリアードか他のエンチャントが１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。炉生まれのオリアードはそれに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー・エンチャント — ニンフ

foreignData.flavorText: 퍼포로스는 자신의 대장간에서 굴러다니는 석탄으로 오레아드를 만들었다.
foreignData.name: 용광로에서 태어난 오레아드
foreignData.text: 성좌 — 용광로에서 태어난 오레아드나 다른 부여마법이 당신의 조종 하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 생물 또는 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 용광로에서 태어난 오레아드는 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다

foreignData.flavorText: Púrforo talhou as oréades dos carvões excedentes em sua forja.
foreignData.name: Oréades Nascidas da Forja
foreignData.text: Constelação — Toda vez que Oréades Nascidas da Forja ou outro encantamento entrar no campo de batalha sob seu controle, Oréades Nascidas da Forja causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Пирфор сотворил ореад из угольков, вылетевших из его горна.
foreignData.name: Рожденные в Горниле Ореады
foreignData.text: Созвездие — Каждый раз, когда Рожденные в Горниле Ореады или другие чары выходят на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Рожденные в Горниле Ореады наносят 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку.

foreignData.flavorText: 普罗烽斯用锻炉里零星的煤渣塑出了山灵。
foreignData.name: 锻生山灵
foreignData.text: 星彩～每当锻生山灵或另一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，锻生山灵对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 普羅烽斯用鍛爐裡零星的煤渣塑出了山靈。
foreignData.name: 鍛生山靈
foreignData.text: 星彩～每當鍛生山靈或另一個結界在你的操控下進戰場時，鍛生山靈對目標生物或玩家造成1點傷害。

name: Forgeborn Oreads
originalText: Constellation — Whenever Forgeborn Oreads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Forgeborn Oreads deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: A constellation ability triggers whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control for any reason. Enchantments with other card types, such as enchantment creatures, will also cause constellation abilities to trigger.

An Aura spell without bestow that has an illegal target when it tries to resolve won't resolve and will be put into its owner's graveyard. It won't enter the battlefield and constellation abilities won't trigger. An Aura spell with bestow won't be countered this way. It will revert to being an enchantment creature and resolve, entering the battlefield and triggering constellation abilities.

When an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, each constellation ability of permanents you control will trigger. You can put these abilities on the stack in any order. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.

text: Constellation — Whenever Forgeborn Oreads or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Forgeborn Oreads deals 1 damage to any target.
